recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1 cup milk, 2 eggs, 2 tbsp sugar, 2 tbsp butter
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients and cook on a hot griddle.

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.ingredients: 4 slices bread, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup milk, 1 tsp cinnamon, 2 tbsp sugar
recipes.instructions: Dip bread in the egg mixture and cook on a griddle until golden.

recipes.title: Smoothie Bowl
recipes.ingredients: 1 banana, 1 cup spinach, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/4 cup granola, 1/2 cup mixed berries
recipes.instructions: Blend banana and spinach with yogurt, top with granola and berries.

recipes.title: Cheeseburger
recipes.ingredients: 1 beef patty (6 oz), 1 slice cheese, 1 lettuce leaf, 1 tomato slice, 1 bun
recipes.instructions: Cook the beef patty, assemble with cheese, lettuce, and tomato in a bun.

recipes.title: Club Sandwich
recipes.ingredients: 3 slices of bread, 4 oz turkey or chicken, 2 slices bacon, 1 lettuce leaf, 1 tomato slice, 2 tbsp mayonnaise
recipes.instructions: Toast the bread. Layer turkey or chicken, bacon, lettuce, and tomato between the slices of bread. Spread mayonnaise on the top slice. Cut into quarters and secure with toothpicks.

recipes.title: Chicken Wrap
recipes.ingredients: 6 oz grilled chicken, 1 lettuce leaf, 1 tomato slice, 1 tortilla
recipes.instructions: Wrap grilled chicken with lettuce and tomato in a tortilla.

recipes.title: Spaghetti
recipes.ingredients: 8 oz pasta, 1 cup sauce, 1/2 cup cheese
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta, add sauce, top with cheese

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.ingredients: 1 salmon fillet (6 oz), 1 lemon, 1 tsp herbs, 1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions: Season salmon and grill until cooked through.

recipes.title: Stir-Fried Vegetables
recipes.ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp ginger
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger, add soy sauce.
